remarks: Composition in the opposite category.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oppcco.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
oppcco.c $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
oppcco.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
oppcco.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
oppcco.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
oppcco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
oppcco $p |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. ( comp ` O ) Z ) F ) = ( F ( <. Z , Y >. .x. X ) G ) ) $.
